title: My pixel 2 phone have an echo problem. Any receiver of all calls hears his self back.
content:
My pixel 2 phone have an echo problem. Any receiver of all calls hears his self back.
If i used the speaker, there is no echo heared by the receivers.
If I turn off the speaker, the receiver hears an echo.
I have updated to the latest android , still problem exist.
I do not know if it is hardware or software issue. Problem disappears when I use speaker mode on my side.
I switched to safe mode and got the same results.
I've gone through all the troubleshooting steps on the phone with Google support. No safe mode doesn't help.
